original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme
tatra khalu bhagavān pe etat avoca

original: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyo sabbā tā kūṭaṅgamā kūṭasamosaraṇā kūṭasamugghātā sabbā tā samugghātaṁ gacchanti;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyaḥ sabbā tā kūṭaṅgamā kūṭa samosaraṇā kūṭa samugghātā sabbā tā samugghātam gacchanti

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci akusalā dhammā sabbe te avijjāmūlakā avijjāsamosaraṇā avijjāsamugghātā, sabbe te samugghātaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ye keci akusalāḥ dhammāḥ sabbe te avijjā mūlakāḥ avijjā samosaraṇāḥ avijjā samugghātā sabbe te samugghātam gacchanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuṁ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā parittam nakha sikhāyam pasum āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yo cāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito yā cāyaṁ mahāpathavī”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu khalu bahutara yaḥ ca ayam mayā parittaḥ nakha sikhā ayam āropitaḥ yā ca ayam mahā pathavī iti
etat eva bhante bahutaram yat idam mahā pathavī

original: Appamattakoyaṁ bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito.
analyzed: appamattakaḥ iyam bhagavatā parittaḥ nakha sikhāyam pasu āropitaḥ

original: Saṅkhampi na upeti upanidhimpi na upeti kalabhāgampi na upeti mahāpathaviṁ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito”ti.
analyzed: saṅkham pi na upeti upanidhim pi na upeti kalabhāgam pi na upeti mahā pathavim upanidhāya bhagavatā parittaḥ nakhasikhāyam pasu āropitaḥ iti

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussesu paccājāyanti;
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave appakāḥ te sattāḥ ye manussesu paccājāyanti

original: atha kho eteyeva bahutarā sattā ye aññatra manussehi paccājāyanti.
analyzed: atha kho ete iva bahutarāḥ sattāḥ ye aññatra manussehi paccājāyanti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici kulāni bahutthikāni appapurisāni tāni suppadhaṁsiyāni honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave yāni kānici kulāni bahutthikāni appa purisāni tāni su padhasiyāni honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettācetovimutti abhāvitā abahulīkatā so suppadhaṁsiyo hoti amanussehi.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettā cetaḥ vimutti a bhāvitā a bahulīkatā saḥ su padhasiyaḥ hoti amanussehi

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici kulāni appitthikāni bahupurisāni tāni duppadhaṁsiyāni honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave yāni kānici kulāni appitthikāni bahu purisāni tāni duppadhasiyāni honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettācetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā so duppadhaṁsiyo hoti amanussehi.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettā cetaḥ vimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā saḥ duppadhasiyaḥ hoti amanussehi

original: ‘mettā no cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā’ti.
analyzed: mettā no cetaḥ vimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yā anīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā su samāraddhā ati

original: “Yo, bhikkhave, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ okkhāsataṁ dānaṁ dadeyya, yo majjhanhikasamayaṁ okkhāsataṁ
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhave pubbaṇhasamayam okkhāsatam dānam dadeyya yaḥ majjhanhika samayam okkhāsata

original: dānaṁ dadeyya, yo sāyanhasamayaṁ okkhāsataṁ dānaṁ dadeyya, yo vā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ
analyzed: dānam dadeyya yaḥ sāyanhasamayam okkhā satam dānam dadeyya yaḥ vā pubbaṇhasamaya

original: antamaso gadduhanamattampi mettacittaṁ bhāveyya, yo vā majjhanhikasamayaṁ antamaso
analyzed: antamasaḥ metta cittam bhāveyya yaḥ vā majjhanhika samayam antamasaḥ

original: gadduhanamattampi mettacittaṁ bhāveyya, yo vā sāyanhasamayaṁ antamaso gadduhanamattampi
analyzed: metta cittam yaḥ vā sāyanha samayam antamasaḥ gadduhana mattampi
metta cittam bhāveyya idam tatas mahapphalatara

original: ‘mettā no cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā’ti.
analyzed: mettā no cetaḥ vimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yā anīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā su samāraddhā ati
sā iyyathā api bhikkhave sattī tiṇha phalā

original: ‘ahaṁ imaṁ sattiṁ tiṇhaphalaṁ pāṇinā vā muṭṭhinā vā paṭileṇissāmi paṭikoṭṭissāmi paṭivaṭṭessāmī’ti.
analyzed: aham imam sattim tiṇha phalam pāṇinā vā muṭṭhinā vā paṭileṇissāmi paṭikoṭṭissāmi paṭivaṭṭessāmi iti

original: bhabbo nu kho so puriso amuṁ sattiṁ tiṇhaphalaṁ pāṇinā vā muṭṭhinā vā paṭileṇetuṁ paṭikoṭṭetuṁ paṭivaṭṭetun”ti?
analyzed: bhabbaḥ nu kho saḥ purisaḥ amum sattim tiṇha phalam pāṇinā vā muṭṭhinā vā paṭileṇetum paṭikoṭṭetum paṭivaṭṭetum ti

original: “Asu hi, bhante, satti tiṇhaphalā na sukarā pāṇinā vā muṭṭhinā vā paṭileṇetuṁ paṭikoṭṭetuṁ paṭivaṭṭetuṁ.
analyzed: hi bhante satti tiṇha phalā na sukarā pāṇinā vā muṭṭhinā vā paṭileṇetum paṭikoṭṭetum paṭivaṭṭetu

original: Yāvadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
analyzed: yāvat eva ca pana saḥ puriso kilamathassa vighātassa bhāgī assa ati

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettācetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettā cetaḥ vimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā

original: yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā, tassa ce amanusso cittaṁ khipitabbaṁ maññeyya;
analyzed: yā anīka tā vatthuka tā anuṭṭhitā paricitā su samāraddhā tassa ce amanussaḥ cittam khipitabbam maññeyya

original: atha kho sveva amanusso kilamathassa vighātassa bhāgī assa.
analyzed: atha kho su eva amanussaḥ kilamathassa vighātassa bhāgī assa

original: ‘mettā no cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā’ti.
analyzed: mettā no cetaḥ vimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yā anīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā su samāraddhā ati

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, cattāro daḷhadhammā dhanuggahā susikkhitā katahatthā katūpāsanā catuddisā ṭhitā assu.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave cattāro daḷha dhammāḥ dhanuggahāḥ su sikkhitāḥ kata hatthāḥ kata upāsanāḥ catuddisā ṭhitāḥ assu

original: ‘ahaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ daḷhadhammānaṁ dhanuggahānaṁ susikkhitānaṁ katahatthānaṁ katūpāsanānaṁ catuddisā kaṇḍe khitte appatiṭṭhite pathaviyaṁ gahetvā āharissāmī’ti.
analyzed: aham imesam catunnam daḷhadhammānam dhanuggahānam su sikkhitānam kata hatthānam kata upāsanānam catuddisā kaṇḍe khitte appatiṭṭhite pathaviyam gahetvā āharissāmi iti
javanaḥ puriso paramena javena samannāgataḥ iti ala vacanāya ati

original: “Ekassa cepi, bhante, daḷhadhammassa dhanuggahassa susikkhitassa katahatthassa katūpāsanassa kaṇḍaṁ khittaṁ appatiṭṭhitaṁ pathaviyaṁ gahetvā āhareyya:
analyzed: ekassa ce pi bhante daḷha dhammassa dhanuggahassa su sikkhitassa kata hatthassa kata upāsanassa kaṇḍam khittam a patiṭṭhitam pathaviyam gahetvā āhareyya

original: ‘javano puriso paramena javena samannāgato’ti alaṁvacanāya, ko pana vādo catunnaṁ daḷhadhammānaṁ dhanuggahānaṁ susikkhitānaṁ katahatthānaṁ katūpāsanānan”ti?
analyzed: javanaḥ puriso paramena javena samannāgato ti alavacanāya kaḥ pana vādaḥ catunnam daḷha dhammānam dhanuggahānam su sikkhitānam kata hatthānam kata upāsanānam ti

original: “Yathā ca, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa javo, yathā ca candimasūriyānaṁ javo, tato sīghataro.
analyzed: yathā ca bhikkhave tassa purisassa javaḥ yathā ca candima sūriyānam javaḥ tatas sīghataraḥ

original: Yathā ca, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa javo yathā ca candimasūriyānaṁ javo yathā ca
analyzed: yathā ca bhikkhave tassa purisassa javaḥ yathā ca candima sūriyānam javaḥ yathā ca

original: yā devatā candimasūriyānaṁ purato dhāvanti tāsaṁ devatānaṁ javo, (…) tato sīghataraṁ
analyzed: yāḥ devatāḥ candima sūriyānam puratas dhāvanti tāsam devatānam

original: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, dasārahānaṁ ānako nāma mudiṅgo ahosi.
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhikkhave dasārahānam ānakaḥ nāma mudiṅgaḥ ahosi

original: Tassa dasārahā ānake ghaṭite aññaṁ āṇiṁ odahiṁsu.
analyzed: tassa dasārahā ānake ghaṭite aññam āṇim odahisu

original: Ahu kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ ānakassa mudiṅgassa porāṇaṁ pokkharaphalakaṁ antaradhāyi.
analyzed: ahu kho saḥ bhikkhave samayaḥ yam ānakassa mudiṅgassa porāṇam pokkhara phalakam antaradhāyi

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ, ye te suttantā tathāgatabhāsitā
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave bhavissanti bhikkhū ye te suttantā tathāgata bhāsitā

original: gambhīrā gambhīratthā lokuttarā suññatappaṭisaṁyuttā, tesu bhaññamānesu na sussūsissanti
analyzed: gambhīrā gambhīratthā lokuttarā suññata paṭisayuttā tesu bhaññamānesu na sussūsissanti

original: na sotaṁ odahissanti na aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpessanti na ca te dhamme uggahetabbaṁ
analyzed: na sotam odahissanti na aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpessanti na ca te dhamme uggahetabba

original: Ye pana te suttantā kavikatā kāveyyā cittakkharā cittabyañjanā bāhirakā sāvakabhāsitā,
analyzed: ye pana te suttantā kavikatā kāveyyā citta kkharā citta byañjanā bāhirakā sāvaka bhāsitā

original: tesu bhaññamānesu sussūsissanti, sotaṁ odahissanti, aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpessanti,
analyzed: tesu bhaññamānesu sussūsissanti sotam odahissanti aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpessanti

original: te ca dhamme uggahetabbaṁ pariyāpuṇitabbaṁ maññissanti.
analyzed: te ca dhamme uggahetabbam pariyāpuṇitabbam maññissanti

original: Evametesaṁ, bhikkhave, suttantānaṁ tathāgatabhāsitānaṁ gambhīrānaṁ gambhīratthānaṁ lokuttarānaṁ suññatappaṭisaṁyuttānaṁ antaradhānaṁ bhavissati.
analyzed: evam bhikkhave suttantānam tathāgata bhāsitānam gambhīrānam gambhīra atthānam lokuttarānam suññata paṭisayuttānam antaradhānam bhavissati

original: ‘ye te suttantā tathāgatabhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīratthā lokuttarā suññatappaṭisaṁyuttā,
analyzed: ye te suttantā tathāgata bhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīra atthā lokuttarā suññata paṭisayuttā

original: tesu bhaññamānesu sussūsissāma, sotaṁ odahissāma, aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpessāma, te
analyzed: tesu bhaññamānesu sussūsissāma sotam odahissāma aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpessāma te
ca dhamme uggahetabbam pariyāpuṇitabbam maññissāma ati

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā vesāliyam viharati mahā vane kūṭāgāra sālāya

original: “Kaliṅgarūpadhānā, bhikkhave, etarahi licchavī viharanti appamattā ātāpino upāsanasmiṁ.
analyzed: kaliṅga rūpadhānāḥ bhikkhave etarahi licchavī viharanti appamattāḥ ātāpinaḥ

original: Tesaṁ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto na labhati otāraṁ na labhati ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: tesam rājā māgadhaḥ ajātasattu vedehi putto na labhati otāram na labhati ārammaṇa

original: Bhavissanti, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṁ licchavī sukhumālā mudutalunahatthapādā
analyzed: bhavissanti bhikkhave anāgata maddhānam licchavī sukhu mālā

original: te mudukāsu seyyāsu tūlabibbohanāsu yāvasūriyuggamanā seyyaṁ kappissanti.
analyzed: te mudukāsu seyyāsu tūla bibbohanāsu seyyam kappissanti

original: Tesaṁ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto lacchati otāraṁ lacchati ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: tesam rājā māgadhaḥ ajātasattu vedehi putto lacchati otāram lacchati ārammaṇa

original: Kaliṅgarūpadhānā, bhikkhave, etarahi bhikkhū viharanti appamattā ātāpino padhānasmiṁ.
analyzed: kaliṅga rūpadhānāḥ bhikkhave etarahi bhikkhū viharanti appamattāḥ ātāpinaḥ

original: Tesaṁ māro pāpimā na labhati otāraṁ na labhati ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: tesam māraḥ pāpimā na labhati otāram na labhati ārammaṇa

original: Bhavissanti, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṁ bhikkhū sukhumā mudutalunahatthapādā.
analyzed: bhavissanti bhikkhave anāgata maddhānam bhikkhū sukhumāḥ

original: Te mudukāsu seyyāsu tūlabibbohanāsu yāvasūriyuggamanā seyyaṁ kappissanti.
analyzed: te mudukāsu seyyāsu tūla bibbohanāsu seyyam kappissanti

original: Tesaṁ māro pāpimā lacchati otāraṁ lacchati ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: tesam māro pāpimā lacchati otāram lacchati ārammaṇa
kaliṅga rūpa dhānāḥ viharissāma appamattāḥ ātāpinaḥ padhānasmin ti

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro navo bhikkhu ativelaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ navaḥ bhikkhu ativelam kulāni upasaṅkamati
saḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamānaḥ evam āha

original: “ime hi nāma therā bhikkhū kulāni upasaṅkamitabbaṁ maññissanti, kimaṅgaṁ panāhan”ti?
analyzed: ime hi nāma therāḥ bhikkhū kulāni upasaṅkamitabbam maññissanti kim aṅgam pana ahanti

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “idha, bhante, aññataro navo bhikkhu ativelaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamati.
analyzed: idha bhante aññataraḥ navaḥ bhikkhu ativelam kulāni upasaṅkamati
saḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamānaḥ evam āha

original: ‘ime hi nāma therā bhikkhū kulāni upasaṅkamitabbaṁ maññissanti, kimaṅgaṁ panāhan’”ti.
analyzed: ime hi nāma therāḥ bhikkhū kulāni upasaṅkamitabbam maññissanti kim aṅgam pana ahanti
bhūta pubba bhikkhave araññāyatane mahā sarasī

original: Te taṁ sarasiṁ ogāhetvā soṇḍāya bhisamuḷālaṁ abbuhetvā suvikkhālitaṁ vikkhāletvā akaddamaṁ saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharanti.
analyzed: te tam sarasim ogāhetvā soṇḍāya bhisa muḷālam abbuhetvā su vikkhālitam vikkhāletvā a kaddamam saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharanti

original: Tesaṁ taṁ vaṇṇāya ceva hoti balāya ca, na ca tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigacchanti maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: tesam tam vaṇṇāya ca iva hoti balāya ca na ca tatonidānam maraṇam vā nigacchanti maraṇa mattam vā dukkha

original: Tesaṁyeva kho pana, bhikkhave, mahānāgānaṁ anusikkhamānā taruṇā bhiṅkacchāpā taṁ
analyzed: kho pana bhikkhave mahā nāgānam anusikkhamānāḥ taruṇāḥ

original: sarasiṁ ogāhetvā soṇḍāya bhisamuḷālaṁ abbuhetvā na suvikkhālitaṁ vikkhāletvā sakaddamaṁ
analyzed: sarasim ogāhetvā soṇḍāya bhisa muḷālam abbuhetvā na su vikkhālitam vikkhāletvā sa kaddama

original: Tesaṁ taṁ neva vaṇṇāya hoti na balāya.
analyzed: tesam tam na iva vaṇṇāya hoti na balāya

original: Tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigacchanti maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: tatonidānam maraṇam vā nigacchanti maraṇa mattam vā dukkha

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idha therā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave idha therāḥ bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya gāmam vā nigamam vā piṇḍāya pavisanti

original: Te taṁ lābhaṁ agadhitā amucchitā anajjhopannā ādīnavadassāvino nissaraṇapaññā paribhuñjanti.
analyzed: te tam lābham agadhitāḥ amucchitāḥ an ajjhopannāḥ ādīnava dassāvinaḥ nissaraṇa paññā paribhuñjanti

original: Tesaṁ taṁ vaṇṇāya ceva hoti balāya ca, na ca tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigacchanti maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: tesam tam vaṇṇāya ca iva hoti balāya ca na ca tatonidānam maraṇam vā nigacchanti maraṇa mattam vā dukkha

original: Tesaṁyeva kho pana, bhikkhave, therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anusikkhamānā navā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisanti.
analyzed: tesayā iva kho pana bhikkhave therānam bhikkhūnam anusikkhamānāḥ navāḥ bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya gāmam vā nigamam vā piṇḍāya pavisanti

original: Te taṁ lābhaṁ gadhitā mucchitā ajjhopannā anādīnavadassāvino anissaraṇapaññā paribhuñjanti.
analyzed: te tam lābham gadhitāḥ mucchitāḥ ajjhopannāḥ anādīnava dassāvinaḥ a nissaraṇa paññā paribhuñjanti

original: Tesaṁ taṁ neva vaṇṇāya hoti na balāya, te tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigacchanti maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: tesam tam na iva vaṇṇāya hoti na balāya te tatonidānam maraṇam vā nigacchanti maraṇa mattam vā dukkha

original: ‘agadhitā amucchitā anajjhopannā ādīnavadassāvino nissaraṇapaññā taṁ lābhaṁ paribhuñjissāmā’ti.
analyzed: a gadhitāḥ a mucchitāḥ an ajjhopannāḥ ādīnava dassāvinaḥ nissaraṇa paññā tam lābham paribhuñjissāma ati

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu ativelaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ bhikkhu ativelam kulesu cārittam āpajjati
mā ayasmai ativelam kulesu cārittam āpajji iti

original: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno na viramati.
analyzed: saḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamānaḥ na viramati

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “idha, bhante, aññataro bhikkhu ativelaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: idha bhante aññataraḥ bhikkhu ativelam kulesu cārittam āpajjati
mā ayasmai ativelam kulesu cārittam āpajji iti

original: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno na viramatī”ti.
analyzed: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamānaḥ na viramati iti

original: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, biḷāro sandhisamalasaṅkaṭīre ṭhito ahosi mudumūsiṁ maggayamāno:
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhikkhave biḷāraḥ sandhi samala saṅka ṭīre ṭhitaḥ ahosi mudumūsim maggayamānaḥ

original: ‘yadāyaṁ mudumūsi gocarāya pakkamissati, tattheva naṁ gahetvā khādissāmī’ti.
analyzed: yadā ayam mudumūsi gocarāya pakkamissati tattha eva nam gahetvā khādissāmi iti

original: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, mudumūsi gocarāya pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhave mudumūsi gocarāya pakkāmi

original: Tamenaṁ biḷāro gahetvā sahasā saṅkhāditvā ajjhohari.
analyzed: tam enam biḷāraḥ gahetvā sahasā saṅkhāditvā ajjhohari

original: Tassa so mudumūsi antampi khādi, antaguṇampi khādi.
analyzed: tassa saḥ antam pi khādi anta guṇam pi khādi

original: So tatonidānaṁ maraṇampi nigacchi maraṇamattampi dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: saḥ tatonidānam maraṇam pi nigacchi maraṇa mattam pi dukkha

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave idha ekaccaḥ bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya

original: gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya arakkhitena
analyzed: gāmam vā nigamam vā piṇḍāya pavisati arakkhitena iva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya arakkhitena

original: So tattha passati mātugāmaṁ dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā.
analyzed: saḥ tattha passati mātugāmam dunnivattham vā duppārutam vā

original: Tassa mātugāmaṁ disvā dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
analyzed: tassa mātugāmam disvā dunnivattham vā duppārutam vā rāgaḥ cittam anuddhaseti

original: So rāgānuddhaṁsena cittena maraṇaṁ vā nigacchati maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: saḥ rāga anuddhasena cittena maraṇam vā nigacchati maraṇa mattam vā dukkha

original: Maraṇañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yo sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
analyzed: maraṇam ha ita bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye yaḥ sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattati

original: Maraṇamattañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ yadidaṁ aññataraṁ saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: maraṇa mattam heta bhikkhave dukkham yat idam aññataram saṅkiliṭṭham āpattim āpajjati

original: ‘rakkhiteneva kāyena rakkhitāya vācāya rakkhitena cittena, upaṭṭhitāya satiyā, saṁvutehi indriyehi gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā’ti.
analyzed: rakkhitena iva kāyena rakkhitāya vācāya rakkhitena cittena upaṭṭhitāya satiyā savutehi indriyehi gāmam vā nigamam vā piṇḍāya pavisissāma ati

original: “Assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ jarasiṅgālassa vassamānassā”ti?
analyzed: no tumhe bhikkhave rattiyā paccūsa samayam jarasiṅgālassa vassamānassa ati

original: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, jarasiṅgālo ukkaṇḍakena nāma rogajātena phuṭṭho.
analyzed: esaḥ kho bhikkhave jarasiṅgālaḥ ukkaṇḍakena nāma roga jātena phuṭṭhaḥ

original: So yena yena icchati tena tena gacchati;
analyzed: saḥ yena yena icchati tena tena gacchati

original: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha tiṭṭhati;
analyzed: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha tiṭṭhati

original: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nisīdati;
analyzed: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nisīdati

original: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nipajjati;
analyzed: yattha yattha icchati tattha tattha nipajjati

original: Sādhu khvassa, bhikkhave, yaṁ idhekacco sakyaputtiyapaṭiñño evarūpampi attabhāvapaṭilābhaṁ paṭisaṁvediyetha.
analyzed: sādhu khvassa bhikkhave yam idha ekaccaḥ sakya puttiya paṭiññaḥ evarūpam pi atta bhāva paṭilābham paṭisavediyetha

original: “Assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ jarasiṅgālassa vassamānassā”ti?
analyzed: no tumhe bhikkhave rattiyā paccūsa samayam jarasiṅgālassa vassamānassa ati

original: “Siyā kho, bhikkhave, tasmiṁ jarasiṅgāle yā kāci kataññutā kataveditā, na tveva idhekacce sakyaputtiyapaṭiññe siyā yā kāci kataññutā kataveditā.
analyzed: siyā kho bhikkhave tasmim jarasiṅgāle yā kāci kataññu tā kata veditā na tu eva idha ekacce sakya puttiya paṭiññe siyā yā kāci kataññu tā kata veditā

original: na ca no amhesu appakampi kataṁ nassissatī’ti.
analyzed: na ca naḥ amhesu appakampi katam nassissati iti
